meanings.definition: The measurement of a length in yards.
meanings.sent1: She measured the yardage of the fabric for the dress.
meanings.sent2: The football player gained a lot of yardage in the game.
meanings.sent3: The tailor chuckled as he calculated the yardage needed for the curtains.
meanings.sent4: The yardage of support from the community was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the fabric yardage caught her eye immediately.

meanings.definition: The amount of yardage gained in a game.
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated their impressive yardage at the end of the match.
meanings.sent2: The coach was pleased with the player's yardage in the game.
meanings.sent3: The yardage on the scoreboard made the fans cheer loudly.
meanings.sent4: The player's determination led to an increase in yardage.
meanings.sent5: The yardage gained by the running back secured the team's victory.

meanings.definition: The total yardage of a fabric.
meanings.sent1: She bought the entire yardage of the floral fabric for her project.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on all yardage of denim.
meanings.sent3: The yardage of the silk fabric shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent4: The yardage of the lace was delicate and intricate.
meanings.sent5: The yardage of the fabric was enough to make multiple outfits.
